Reviews.Title: Cool camera..
Reviews.Author: venkatesh
Reviews.Content: wanted something not heavy as a DSLR and not too costly.  This camera had all the features I needed and added accessories which I din't have to purchase seperately.  and zoom is very good and the picture quality is nice.Would recommend for frequent travelers like me and within budget with all features.

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Black)
4 AA Pack NiMH Rechargeable Batteries and Charger
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card
USB SDHC Card Reader + Memory Card Wallet
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Black) 2600 mAh 4 AA Pack NiMH Rechargeable Batteries and Charger + 16GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Carrying Case + SDHC Card USB Reader + Memory Card Wallet + Deluxe Starter Kit Bundle DavisMAX Accessory Kit
